definition: Fujian and Guangdong
short name for Fujian province 福建[Fu2 jian4]/also pr. [Min2]
Cantonese/short name for Guangdong 廣東|广东[Guang3 dong1]

sentences.english: However, the two provinces developed in different ways because of the government's different policies of immigrations.
sentences.chinese: 在臺灣與四川移民社會中的閩粵家族發展即是例證。

sentences.english: The increased use of wood composites in building materials results in a need for a better understanding of wood adhesion.
sentences.chinese: 臺灣傳統閩粵建築以木料作爲柱樑及隔扇的主要材料。

sentences.english: Hakka culture is the most advantage and important condition in the regional cooperation in the border of Fujian, Guangdong and Jiangxi.
sentences.chinese: 閩粵贛邊區域合作中客家文化是最具優勢的重要條件。

sentences.english: From the mid-Ching onwards, large numbers of emigrants went abroad from Fujian and Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 清中葉以降，大量的閩粵移民出洋。

sentences.english: And, a most obvious example for this problem, was the developments of the immigrant families there from Guangdong, and Fujian province.
sentences.chinese: 在臺灣與四川移民社會中的閩粵家族發展即是例證。

sentences.english: The reaches of the Dingjiang River in the border region of Fujian anf Guangdong are the habitats of the Kejia nationality.
sentences.chinese: 位於閩粵邊區的汀江流域是客家族羣聚居之地。

definition: Meixian county in Meizhou 梅州, Guangdong
Wuhua county in Meizhou 梅州, Guangdong/Wuhua district of Kunming city 昆明市[Kun1 ming2 shi4], Yunnan
Guangning county in Zhaoqing 肇慶|肇庆[Zhao4 qing4], Guangdong
Jiaoling county in Meizhou 梅州, Guangdong
Raoping county in Chaozhou 潮州[Chao2 zhou1], Guangdong
coastland/coastal areas
short name for Fujian province 福建[Fu2 jian4]/also pr. [Min2]
Lufeng county level city in Shanwei, Guangdong 汕尾
Zhao'an county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian
Xianyou county in Putian 莆田[Pu2 tian2], Fujian
see 門第|门第[men2 di4]
Laiyang county level city in Yantai 煙台|烟台, Shandong
area outside a city gate
Datong or Tatung township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
person from the same province
(lit.) leftover men/(fig.) loyalist adherents of a former dynasty/surviving members of an ethnic group
Anxi county in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian
